name: Kaiju Birthday
description:
Made for Low Effort Game Jam 14, theme: Birthday.

  • Created with
    • Unreal Engine, using Top Town Character Template if it wasn't already obvious
    • Blender for models
    • Music made in LMMS

Working time: Approximately 4 hours

The download is 500 MB I'm sorry I have no idea what I'm doing.

There's only a windows build because I can't figure out mac and unreal doesn't support HTML out-of-the-box.
